Package databaseConnection

Class DatabaseUpdate

java.lang.Object
databaseConnection.SignupAndLoginExceptions
databaseConnection.DatabaseUpdate
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBconnection
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlatformDBConn, ShopDBConn
public abstract class DatabaseUpdate extends SignupAndLoginExceptions implements DBconnection
This abstract class provides the implementation for common database update operations and defines methods to be implemented for specific actions such as lending and receiving cups.

  • Nested Class Summary

    • DatabaseUpdate

      public DatabaseUpdate() throws SQLException
      Constructs a DatabaseUpdate object and establishes a connection to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

  • Method Details

    • lendCup

      public abstract void lendCup(int cupID, String ID) throws SQLException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException
      Lends a cup to a user.
      Parameters:
      cupID - the ID of the cup to lend.
      ID - the ID of the user borrowing the cup.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException - if the account does not exist.

    • receiveCup

      public abstract void receiveCup(int cupID) throws SQLException
      Receives a cup that was lent out.
      Parameters:
      cupID - the ID of the cup being returned.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • updateTransactionRecord

      public void updateTransactionRecord(int cupID, String from, String fromID, String to, String toID) throws SQLException
      Updates the transaction record with the details of a cup transaction.
      Parameters:
      cupID - the ID of the cup involved in the transaction.
      from - the source of the transaction.
      fromID - the ID of the source.
      to - the destination of the transaction.
      toID - the ID of the destination.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
